info.title: javascript:alert(1)
info.description:
**Environments:**

* Production - [https://mam.salestreamsoft.com/api/rest/](javascript:alert(1))
* Test - [http://mam1.salestreamsoft.com/api/rest/](http://mam1.salestreamsoft.com/api/rest/)

**Authentication:**

All requests to MasterStream's REST API require you to authenticate using HTTP Basic Auth to convey your identity. The username is your token. The password is your token secret. Your token and password are issued by the administrator of your MasterStream account in **System Setup > Branding & Access > Token Management**.

Click the name of the API to expand the contents, view its information, and/or send API requests.

get.description: Lists the orders for a specific agent based on status and date range. **Use with API/Data token.**

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Optional filter to fetch only orders with given status.

parameters.name: dateType
parameters.description: To specify which type of date you want ofilter on.

get.description: Returns order data for a specific order id. **Use with API/Data token.**
Lists the orders for a specific customer based on status and date range. **Use with API/Data token.**

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Optional filter to fetch only orders with given status.

parameters.name: dateType
parameters.description: To specify which type of date you want ofilter on.

get.description: Lists the service locations of an order for a specific order id. **Use with API/Data token.**
Lists the service locations of orders within specific date range. **Use with API/Data token.**
Lists the questions and answers of each order interview for a specific order id. **Use with API/Data token.**
Returns files stored for a specific order id (uploaded by a user via UI). **Use with API/Data token.**
Returns list of order ids by benchmark. **Use with API/Data token.**
Returns client id for a specific order id, if applicable. **Use with API/Data token.**
Returns client id by last update. **Use with API/Data token.**

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: Valid agent id. If provided, only ids that are related to the agent will be returned.

get.summary: Agent and Client by Order ID
get.description: Returns an aggregation of client, client company (customer), agent, agent company objects by a specific order id, if applicable. **Use with API/Data token.**
Returns order notes for a specific order id. **Use with API/Data token.**
Lists order ids created within a date range. **Use with API/Data token.**

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Valid client company (aka. customer) id. If provided, only ids with the client company will be returned.

get.description: Lists order ids by last update. **Use with API/Data token.**

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Valid client company (aka. customer) id. If provided, only ids with the client company will be returned.

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: Valid agent id. If provided, only ids with the agent will be returned.

put.description: Updates the status of an order based on a specific order id. **Use with API/Data token. Access to this API is enabled on a per-token basis. Please request a ticket for access.**

get.description: Returns a paginated RFQ Summary. **Use with API/Data token.**

parameters.name: is_salesforce
parameters.description: Boolean value of submission source "t" for true or "f" for false

parameters.name: rfq_status
parameters.description: Filter Based on RFQ Status-valid values are "Open" or "Closed"

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Choose how many RFQ's to return. 1-100 (Returns 25 by Default)

parameters.name: opened
parameters.description: Filter by the date the RFQ was opened. The format is: YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: agent_first_name
parameters.description: Filter by the agent's first name

parameters.name: agent_last_name
parameters.description: Filter by the agent's last name

parameters.name: requirements
parameters.description: Filter by the requirements of the RFQ

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Filter by the location's street address

get.description: Lists basic RFQ info with filtering options. **Use with API/Data token.**

parameters.name: sfOppId
parameters.description: Optional search by Salesforce Opportunity Id

parameters.name: serviceStatus
parameters.description: Options: 'All', 'Abandoned', 'Bad NPANXX', 'Clarification', 'Competitor', 'Expired', 'ICB Needed', 'Internal Review', 'No Solution', 'Order Cancelled', 'Ordered', 'Order Halted', 'Order Returned', 'Processing', 'Ready', 'Requested', 'Requested Docs', 'Sent Order Docs', 'SPR Needed', 'Unresponsive', 'Working'

parameters.name: productType
parameters.description: Options: 'All', 'Cloud Services', 'Hosted PBX', 'Integrated/Dynamic', 'Internet', 'Local Voice', 'Long Distance', 'MPLS/VPN', 'Other', 'Private Line', 'Wireless/Mobility'

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of records per page. Integer. For Pagination.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number to return. Integer. For pagination. Starts with 1.

get.description: Lists RFQ tracking numbers created within a date range. **Use with API/Data token.**

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Valid client company (aka. customer) id. If provided, only ids with the client company will be returned.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: If provided, only RFQs submitted by agent companies registered to this user ID will be returned. This can only be used by Data tokens.

get.description: Lists quote ids created within a date range. **Use with API/Data token.**

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: Date format is: YYYY-MM-DD. endDate is not inclusive.

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Valid client company (aka. customer) id. If provided, only ids with the client company will be returned.

200.description: The result is represented as a JSON string. The key of the object is ParentQuoteId, its value is a collection of LocationQuoteIds, each of which has a boolean property of "show". In a multi-location quote there is a single ParentQuoteId for each vendor and term combination but there is one LocationQuoteId for every location and term quoted.

get.description: Lists quote ids by last update. **Use with API/Data token.**

parameters.name: customerId
parameters.description: Valid client company (aka. customer) id. If provided, only ids with the client company will be returned.

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: Valid agent id. If provided, only ids with the agent will be returned.

Returns requirement (with location requirements) for a specific RFQ. **Use with API/Data token.**
Lists the questions and answers of each order interview for a specific order based on its originating quote id. **Use with API/Data token.**

get.summary: Order Interview Questions by Parent Quote ID
get.description: Returns pre-defined order interview questions by given parent quote id. **Use with API/Data token.**

get.description: Returns the detailed information of a customer (client company) based on its name. **Use with API/Data token.**

parameters.name: companyName
parameters.description: Case-insensetive. This is not a partial match, although special charecters are ignored. Please refer to following regular expression for matching rules, /[^0-9a-zA-Z& ]/ Query key is case-sensetive.

get.description: Returns an id list of customer (client company) in the company. **Use with API/Data token.**

parameters.name: agentCompanyId
parameters.description: Agent company id, only ids with in specified agent company will be returned.

get.description: Returns an id list of customer (client company) in the company by last update. **Use with API/Data token.**

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: Valid agent id. If provided, only ids that are related to the agent will be returned.

post.description: Creates a new customer (client company) under a specific agent. **Use with API/Data token.**
